item.description:
Kris Quinones will be hosting our first Sunday Brunch meetup! This meetup will have the same format as the monthly Friday lunchtime meetups. The first hour will be for the potluck brunch and networking. The second hour will be a presentation by Kris on "Ayurveda Bodywork."

The meetup will take place from 10:30 am - 12:30 pm.

Kris can host 10 members at this meetup. Please RSVP what you are bringing to the potluck.

If more than 10 people want to attend, we will have a waiting list.
item.name: Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Sunday Brunch: Sunday, March 15
